biotools.summary: Graphical displays with embedded statistical tests for gated ICS flow cytometry data, and a data class which stores "stacked" data and has methods for computing summary measures on stacked data, such as marginal and polyfunctional degree data.

bioschemas.name: flowPlots
bioschemas.summary: Graphical displays with embedded statistical tests for gated ICS flow cytometry data, and a data class which stores "stacked" data and has methods for computing summary measures on stacked data, such as marginal and polyfunctional degree data.
